simplemlp.name: simpleMLP
simplemlp.description: R package consisting of a multilayer perceptron neural network implementation, featuring 2 ReLU hidden layers, and achieving 96% test accuracy on MNIST.

arctic-miner.subtitle:
Made for UofTHacks VII

arctic-miner.description: Application allowing users to collect penguins on an ethereum blockchain, helping users visualize and understand the concept of blockchain.

politician-game.name: Politician Game
politician-game.description: Satirical android application consisting of three minigames simulating a political campaign with support for user login, leaderboards, and unlockable sprites.

meal-prep-4-u.name: Meal Prep 4 U
meal-prep-4-u.subtitle: Made for BostonHacks 2019
meal-prep-4-u.description: Web application designed to help university students meal prep by generating ingredients based on user's ingredients and preferences to provide healthy, cost-reducing meals.
